job_details.Functieomschrijving: Ben jij een Data Engineer of Data Scientist met een passie voor Artificial Intelligence (AI)? Heb je minimaal twee jaar werkervaring? En wil je je graag verder ontwikkelen? Dan bieden wij jou de unieke kans om in een Fast Track van zes weken uit te groeien tot een expert op het gebied van Artificial Intelligence. Na dit opleidingsprogramma beschik je over de volgende vaardigheden en kennis:
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer

Ben jij een Data Engineer of Data Scientist met een passie voor Artificial Intelligence (AI)? Heb je minimaal twee jaar werkervaring? En wil je je graag verder ontwikkelen? Dan bieden wij jou de unieke kans om in een Fast Track van zes weken uit te groeien tot een expert op het gebied van Artificial Intelligence. Na dit opleidingsprogramma beschik je over de volgende vaardigheden en kennis:

profile_classification.rationale: The job description is very brief and focuses on a 'Fast Track' training program to become an AI expert. It lacks specific details about core responsibilities, technologies, or typical projects that would allow for a definitive classification into ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles. It appears to be more of an educational or developmental opportunity rather than a standard job role.

phrases.phrase: Data Engineer or Data Scientist with a passion for Artificial Intelligence (AI)
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates the target audience has a background in data-related roles and an interest in AI, implying a need to understand how AI aligns with business goals.

phrases.phrase: unique opportunity to grow into an expert in the field of Artificial Intelligence
phrases.justification: This suggests the role aims to develop individuals who can apply AI to business problems.

phrases.phrase: expert in the field of Artificial Intelligence
phrases.justification: This implies the development and application of AI models, which falls under the modeling category.

phrases.phrase: grow into an expert on Artificial Intelligence
phrases.justification: Becoming an expert in AI often involves developing and integrating AI capabilities into software systems.
Indicates a strong interest and willingness to learn about AI.
Shows a desire for professional growth and learning.
Suggests an intensive learning program, requiring adaptability and quick learning.

phrases.phrase: grow into an expert in the field of Artificial Intelligence
phrases.justification: Highlights the goal of acquiring new, advanced knowledge and skills.
Refers to the acquisition of new competencies, implying a learning process.
These roles inherently involve problem-solving with data and technical challenges.

phrases.phrase: grow into an expert in the field of Artificial Intelligence
phrases.justification: Becoming an expert implies the ability to tackle complex AI-related problems.
